data.title: The Celebrity Son of Liv Tyler and Royston Langdon |
data.meta_description: Milo William Langdon Milo William Langdon is the celebrity son of Liv Tyler and Royston Langdon, who were both famous entertainers in their own right. He was born on December 14, 2004, in New York City, and has been a familiar face in the media since his early childhood.
data.text:
Milo William Langdon

Milo William Langdon is the celebrity son of Liv Tyler and Royston Langdon, who were both famous entertainers in their own right.

He was born on December 14, 2004, in New York City, and has been a familiar face in the media since his early childhood.

Here are some facts you need to know about Milo William Langdon and his family.

How old is Liv Tylerâs son Milo?

Milo William Langdon is currently 18 years old as of July 2023.

He celebrated his high school graduation on June 30, 2023, with his mother and his younger siblings.

Liv Tyler shared the news of his milestone with a series of posts on her Instagram account, showing how proud she was of her son.

Does Liv Tyler have a child?

Liv Tyler has three children in total.

She shares Milo William Langdon with her ex-husband Royston Langdon, whom she married in 2003 and divorced in 2008.

She also has two children with her former partner David Gardner, whom she dated from 2014 to 2020.

They are Sailor Gene Gardner, born on February 11, 2015, and Lula Rose Gardner, born on July 8, 2016.

Who is the father of Liv Tylerâs son?

The father of Liv Tylerâs son Milo is Royston Langdon, an English musician who is the lead singer and bassist of the rock band Spacehog.

He was born on May 1, 1972, in Leeds, England.

He met Liv Tyler in 2000 at a party and they dated for two years before getting married on March 25, 2003, in a private ceremony in Barbados.

They separated in May 2008 and finalized their divorce in October 2009.

They have remained good friends and co-parents for their son.

Why did Tyler break up with Liv?

Tyler and Liv broke up because of their different lifestyles and career goals.

According to a source close to the couple, they had grown apart over the years and realized that they wanted different things in life.

Tyler wanted to focus on his music and live a low-key life in New York, while Liv wanted to pursue her acting career and travel around the world.

They also had different parenting styles and opinions on how to raise their son.

They decided to end their marriage amicably and respectfully, without any drama or bitterness6

How old was Liv Tyler when she found out who her dad was?

Liv Tyler was eight years old when she found out who her biological father was.

She was born on July 1, 1977, in New York City, to model and singer Bebe Buell and Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler.

However, she was raised by Buellâs then-boyfriend Todd Rundgren, who gave her his surname and acted as her legal father.

She did not know the truth about her paternity until she met Steven Tyler at a concert when she was eight and noticed their resemblance.

Milo William Langdon then confronted her mother and learned that Steven Tyler was her real father.

She changed her surname to Tyler but maintained a close relationship with Rundgren as well.

How old was Liv Tyler in Lord of the Rings?

Liv Tyler was 23 years old when she starred in the first film of the Lord of the Rings trilogy, The Fellowship of the Ring, which was released on December 19, 2001.

She played the role of Arwen UndÃ³miel, an elf princess who falls in love with the human hero Aragorn.

She reprised her role in the sequels The Two Towers (2002) and The Return of the King (2003), which became one of the highest-grossing film series in history.

Her performance earned her critical acclaim and several awards nominations

Is Tyler still engaged?

Tyler is no longer engaged to David Gardner, whom she met through their mutual friend Kate Moss in 2014.

They got engaged in 2015 after welcoming their first child together, Sailor Gene Gardner.

They had another child together, Lula Rose Gardner, in 2016.

However, they never got married and announced their split in January 2020 after six years together.

They cited their busy schedules and long-distance relationship as the reasons for their breakup.

They have remained friendly and co-parent their children amicably.

Conclusion

Milo William Langdon is the celebrity son of Liv Tyler and Royston Langdon, who have both achieved fame and success in their respective fields of entertainment.

He is also the grandson of rock legend Steven Tyler and the older brother of Sailor Gene Gardner and Lula Rose Gardner.

Milo William Langdon recently graduated from high school and has a bright future ahead of him.

He is a private and low-profile person who does not have any social media accounts and rarely makes any public appearances.

He is close to his family and enjoys spending time with them.
